attributes.additional_details:
A special youth programme for 16-year-olds, inspired by Britain's postwar national service, will be established by a Conservative government to end a "pointless waste of potential" among teenagers, David Cameron announced in 2010 before he came to power.
In light of recent events through out the UK I think it is time we gave the youth a real purpose and education.

Sign up if you agree that MP's should consider this.

rejection.details:
Due to an administrative error, this e-petition was accepted onto the site by a department other than that responsible for the issue raised.

Please accept our apologies for this error.  You may wish to consider resubmitting your e-petition.
